Frame.Dialog:
It's a Gigantic casino hosted by J Corp. It's an impressive place where all kinds of people gather and bet all of their belongings for a chance at hitting it big.
How about you? Can you get anything out of this crazy board?

Choice.Desc: Bet 50% of your current Ahn: 50/50 chance to either [green]double it [red]or lose it.
Bet your equipment: 50/50 chance to either [green]gain additional copies of all equipped Key Pages, [red]or lose them.
Bet a librarian's life: 50/50 chance to either [green]heal all librarians to full HP and revive dead librarians, [red]or kill a random librarian.
Just pay the entrance fee and leave without gambling. [red]Costs 10 Ahn.
